item.description:
CT REIA and Alan Cowgill presents: Unlimited Supply of Money For Residential and Commercial Properties


August 15, 2011 – 5:30 to 9:00 PM
Crowne Plaza Hotel. 100 Berlin Road. Cromwell, CT
FREE for CTREIA and AOACT members | $30 for guests


Click Here to learn more and register


Could You Use An Unlimited Supply Of Money To Do All The Residential And Commercial Deals You Can Find? At the August 2011 Monthly Meeting, Alan Cowgill will show you how you can get all the money you need to buy single-family houses, commercial buildings, apartment complexes, or luxury homes, regardless of your credit or financial situation… within 30 days.


What You Will Learn

* How to get all the money you need to buy single-family houses, commercial buildings, apartment complexes, or luxury homes, regardless of your credit or financial situation… within 30 days
* Crucial 5 steps to success, so that you can find all the private money you need: Build Credibility, Generate Leads, Secure Private Lenders, Buy/Sell Property, Pay Day
* How to pre-screen your prospects and the “Magic” words to get them to commit
* Scripts you should use when talking to people you know, their voicemails, and/or referrals
* Why these 4 commonly used types of financing can cripple your real estate business and how to stay away from them: Bank, Line of credit, Hard money lender, Creative financing
* How to do all of this with no monthly payments


Schedule

5:30 – Meet the Businesses Who Can Support Your Business
5:45 – Early Bird Workshop: Speed Networking
Someone in this room could be worth $1000, $5000, or more to you. Make the right connection with someone who could lead you to a deal, a contractor, or referral. Bring plenty of business cards and be prepared to share what you are looking for.
6:45 – Deal Making and Raffle. Hear the hot deals our members are selling. Plus participate in our raffle.
7:00 – Alan Cowgill. Get the money you need to buy commercial and residential properties, regardless of your credit or financial situation.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA Monthly Meeting with Alan Cowgill - Money For Investment Properties
